original_text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant, that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard.
korean_text: 때가 이르매 농부들에게 포도원 소출 얼마를 받으려고 한 종을 보내니

sentences.original_text: And at season he sent to husbandmen a servant
sentences.korean_translation: 때가 되매 그가 농부들에게 한 종을 보내니

sentences.original_text: that he might receive from the husbandmen
of the fruit of the vineyard
